naslov: Otok Vir kuća s 5 apartmana,uhodan posao turist. najma,170m od mora (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Lokacija: Vir je otok u Zadarskoj županiji udaljen 23km ili 20min vožnje od Zadra, 15km ili 10min vožnje do povijesnog grada Nina, 38km od Zračne luke Zadar-Zemunik, spojen je s kopnom lučkim mostom. Opis: Prodaje se kuća na udaljenosti od plaže Prezida 170m te cca 200m od mora i plaže sa sjeverne strane, na početku Vira, na mirnoj lokaciji. Kuća se nalazi na parceli površine 242 m2, ukupne površine cca 200m2. Vrlo je interesantna kao investicija jer je kategorizirirana i uhodana za turistički najam. Sastoji se od ukupno 5 apartmana od kojih je jedan dvosoban, 3 jednosobna te jedan studio apartman. Uređena okućnica i dvorište površine 121m2 u kojem je moguće pakirati 4-5 vozila te je smješten zajednički grill. U prizemlju su smještena dva apartmana: Apartman 1 površine je 74m2 sastoji se od natkrivene terase 14,93m2, kuhinje spojene sa blagovaonicom i dnevnim boravkom 24,11m2, spavaće sobe od 10,89m2, druge spavaće sobe od 13,77m2, ostave od 5,41m2 i kupaonice od 4,88m2. Apartman 2 je studio apartman površine 20,55m2, a sastoji od kupaonice 2,27m2, spavaće sobe 9,26m2 i lođe 9,02m2. U prizemlju se još nalazi i dodatno vanjsko spremište (ostava) površine 2,50m2 koje se nalazi ispod vanjskih stepenica koje vode na kat kuće. Bruto površina prizemlja je 121 m², od čega neto 97 m². Na katu koji je povezan vanjskim stepenicama smještena su tri približno podjednaka apartmana: Apartman 3 površine je 26,20m2 i sastoji od kuhinje spojene sa blagovaonicom 12,92m2,spavaće sobe 9,78m2, kupaonice 3,50m2, terase 7,40m2 Apartman 4 površine je 26,20m2 i sastoji od kuhinje spojene sa blagovaonicom 12,92m2, spavaće sobe 9,78m2, kupaonice 3,50m2, terase 7,40m2 Apartman 5 površine je 30,98m2 koji se sastoji od stubišta 5,4m2, lođe 4,98m2,kuhinje spojene sa blagovaonicom 10,48m2, kupaonice 1.95m2 te spavaće sobe 8,17m2 Bruto površina kata je je 121 m², od čega neto 103 m². Svi apartmani su potpuno namješteni i klimatizirani prijenosnim klima uređanjima. Kuća ima gusternu zapremine 19 m3 te septičku jamu za otpadne vode, a uskoro biti priključena na gradski vodovod i kanalizaciju, u prizemlju peć na drva. U dvorištu se nalazi roštilj te pet parkirnih mjesta. Apartmani imaju uhodan posao u iznajmljivanju i kuća se prodaje u potpunosti namještena. Papiri i vlasništvo uredno. Odmah spremno za preuzimanje i moguć dogovor oko cijene. Agencijska provizija za kupca 3% + PDV od dogovorene kupoprodajne cijene. Za sve informacije i dogovor oko razgledavanja nekretnine obratite se: +38598520673 Natalija natalija@ambienta-nekretnine.hr Location: Vir is an island in Zadar County 23km or 20min drive from Zadar, 15km or 10min drive to the historic town of Nin, 38km from Zadar-Zemunik Airport, connected to the mainland by a port bridge. Description: House for sale at a distance from the beach Prezida 170m and about 200m from the sea and the beach on the north side, at the beginning of Vir, in a quiet location. The house is located on a plot of 242 m2, total area of approximately 200m2. It is very interesting as an investment because it is categorized and established for tourist rentals. It consists of a total of 5 apartments, one of which is two bedroom, 3 one-bedroom and one studio apartment. Landscaped garden and yard of 121m2 in which it is possible to pack 4-5 vehicles and there is a common grill. On the ground floor there are two apartments: Apartment 1 of 74m2 consists of a covered terrace of 14.93m2, kitchen connected to the dining room and living room 24.11m2, bedroom of 10.89m2, second bedroom of 13.77m2, pantry of 5.41m2 and bathroom of 4.88m2. Apartment 2 is a studio apartment of 20.55m2 and consists of a bathroom of 2.27m2, a bedroom of 9.26m2 and a loggia of 9.02m2. On the ground floor there is also an additional outdoor storage (pantry) of 2.50m2, which is located under the external stairs leading to the first floor of the house. The gross area of the ground floor is 121 m², of which the net is 97 m². On the first floor, which is connected by external stairs, there are three approximately equal apartments: Apartment 3 of 26.20m2 and consists of a kitchen connected to the dining room 12.92m2, bedroom 9.78m2, bathroom 3.50m2, terrace 7.40m2  Apartment 4 has an area of 26.20m2 and consists of a kitchen connected to the dining room 12.92m2, bedroom 9.78m2, bathroom 3.50m2, terrace 7.40m2  Apartment 5 of 30.98m2 consisting of a staircase of 5.4m2, loggia 4.98m2, kitchen connected to the dining room 10.48m2, bathroom 1.95m2 and bedroom 8.17m2 The gross area of the floor is 121 m², of which the net is 103 m². All apartments are fully furnished and air-conditioned with portable air conditioning. The house has a water tank with a volume of 19 m3 and a septic tank for wastewater, and soon be connected to the city water supply and sewerage, on the ground floor a wood stove. In the yard there is a barbecue and five parking spaces. The apartments have a well-established business in renting and the house is sold fully furnished. Papers and ownership neat. Immediately ready for pick-up and possible price agreement. Agency fee for the buyer 3% + VAT from the agreed purchase price. For all information and agreement on viewing the property, please contact: +3859898520673 Natalija natalija@ambienta-nekretnine.hr
